content: RIOBET is launching their signature campaign on bitcointalk. This will be a one week long campaign. I am holding the campaign budget to the following address.Code:bc1qmq3qhrv022vdls35592e3udxhhpejlgjpypx3y    WEBSITE           SPREADSHEET   Campaign Rules🗸 Wear appropriate Signature, avatar🗸 Minimum 25 posts a week to get paid🗸 Minimum 10 posts in Gambling,  Gambling discussion baord.🗸 Post must be minimum 150 characters long🗸 Have minimum 5 merits in the last 120 days🗸 Post in Off-Topic, Archival, Games & Rounds, Investor-based games, other signature campaign threads including this one, any kind of ANN threads (ANN posted in Gambling board are allowed), Wall observers, Serious discussion, Altcoin Discussion - and where signature is not visible will not count. 🗸 No valid negative from DT network unless per-approvals by me. 🗸 Join my telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAImportant informationYou are not allowed to change anything on the signature code, if found then you will be disqualified without prior notice.I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign or any rules of this campaign.Week starts from Thursday and ends on Wednesday UTCPlease check the spreadsheet comment column regularly, and also always check your payment information.Payouts10 X Hero+: 0.003BTC/w5 X Sr : 0.002BTC/wHow to applyReply with following informationCode:Current number of post (Including this one): Rank:bech32
